articles.author: Matt Egan
articles.title: Trump’s media stock plunges after posting a big loss for 2023 - CNN
articles.description: Truth Social owner Trump Media & Technology Group disclosed Monday that it lost more than $58 million and generated very little revenue in 2023.
articles.content:
Shares ofTruth Social owner Trump Media & Technology Group plunged Monday after the company disclosed that it lost more than $58 million and generated very little revenue in 2023.
